name: Blue Blood Red Blood
description:
A short fictional tale set in the Russian Revolution.

A story about a young man named Kolya who ran away from a torment so huge he has never uttered the words that describe it. Poor and homeless he reunites with his childhood friend in Russia's then famous capital St Petersburg. 

Next thing you know it's WW1. 

The game explores themes of the War, Poverty, Abuse, Love, Brotherhood and Friendship.

Learn about the Russian Revolution  with Kolya with this historical visual novel!

Game Features Include: 

• 2 hours worth of gameplay.

• An Enticing storyline.

• Fact Cards (with sources!)

• Mini-Games and lots of them! 

• An Educational Quiz.

• An Unlockable scene!

(Originally a University Project!)
